<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5058) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 216 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=211)

**Prerequisites**
[Bard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5057)

</column>

---

You gain the basic [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the bard archetype, add a common occult spell of the appropriate rank, or another appropriate occult spell you learned or discovered, to your repertoire.

<title level="2">Basic Bard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Bard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5064), [Occult Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5063)
